conversion_verification.notes: The conversion is a successful isometric cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth and wall thickness; however, some wall tops are semi-transparent/ghosted, reducing structural weight slightly.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Excellent room adjacency; BED-2 wing is correctly oriented. Balcony areas (Decks) are simplified into internal-style spaces without clear railings.

interior_elements.notes: All major furniture blocks are present and logically scaled to the layout.

visual_clarity.notes: The 'ghostly' material on wall tops makes some geometry slightly harder to read, but the presentation is clean and professional.

detected_errors.description: The outdoor deck features are rendered similarly to interior rooms, losing the distinct open-air architectural quality.

summary: A high-fidelity 3D conversion that accurately translates the complex floor plan into a clean, legible isometric model.
